name: LeftFams_Rich
Description: Richness of Brachytheciaceae, Grimmiaceae, Leskeaceae, and Orthotrichaceae (families associated with reference sites)

name: LeftFams_RelRich
Description: Relative richness of Brachytheciaceae, Grimmiaceae, Leskeaceae, and Orthotrichaceae (families associated with reference sites)

name: RightFams_Rich
Description: Richness of Aulacomniaceae, Bryaceae, Fabroniaceae, Fissidentaceae, Fontinalaceae, Meesiacaeae, Mielichhoferaceae (families associated with non-reference sites)

name: RightFams_RelRich
Description: Relative richness of Aulacomniaceae, Bryaceae, Fabroniaceae, Fissidentaceae, Fontinalaceae, Meesiacaeae, Mielichhoferaceae (families associated with non-reference sites)

name: Fugitive_Rich
Description: Richness of taxa with a Fugitive life strategy (BET)
